metadata.name: Holding on to Hope
metadata.description:
" Breathe in the good.
Hold onto hope.
When everyone’s gone
And you’re left holding pieces
Of what you thought was something but
Is actually nothing
at all;
Has never been anything
at all;
Blind dysphoria is all that’s left.
Heartbeats grow faint.
Will drifts into the abyss of loneliness profound.
But I will hold onto hope.
I will breathe in the good.
For a little while longer "

--Marduk Knight
